48 namespace moveit {
49 namespace task_constructor {
50 namespace stages {
51 
52 GeneratePlacePose::GeneratePlacePose(const std::string& name) : GeneratePose(name) {
53  auto& p = properties();
54  p.declare<std::string>("object");
55  p.declare<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>("ik_frame");
56 }
57 
58 void GeneratePlacePose::onNewSolution(const SolutionBase& s) {
59  planning_scene::PlanningSceneConstPtr scene = s.end()->scene();
60 
61  const auto& props = properties();
62  const std::string& object = props.get<std::string>("object");
63  std::string msg;
64  if (!scene->getCurrentState().hasAttachedBody(object))
65  msg = "'" + object + "' is not an attached object";
66  if (scene->getCurrentState().getAttachedBody(object)->getFixedTransforms().empty())
67  msg = "'" + object + "' has no associated shapes";
68  if (!msg.empty()) {
69  if (storeFailures()) {
70  InterfaceState state(scene);
71  SubTrajectory solution;
72  solution.markAsFailure();
73  solution.setComment(msg);
74  spawn(std::move(state), std::move(solution));
75  } else
76  ROS_WARN_STREAM_NAMED("GeneratePlacePose", msg);
77  return;
78  }
79 
80  upstream_solutions_.push(&s);
81 }
82 
83 void GeneratePlacePose::compute() {
84  if (upstream_solutions_.empty())
85  return;
86 
87  const SolutionBase& s = *upstream_solutions_.pop();
88  planning_scene::PlanningSceneConstPtr scene = s.end()->scene()->diff();
89  const moveit::core::RobotState& robot_state = scene->getCurrentState();
90  const auto& props = properties();
91 
92  const moveit::core::AttachedBody* object = robot_state.getAttachedBody(props.get<std::string>("object"));
93  // current object_pose w.r.t. planning frame
94  const Eigen::Isometry3d& orig_object_pose = object->getGlobalCollisionBodyTransforms()[0];
95 
96  const geometry_msgs::PoseStamped& pose_msg = props.get<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>("pose");
97  Eigen::Isometry3d target_pose;
98  tf::poseMsgToEigen(pose_msg.pose, target_pose);
99  // target pose w.r.t. planning frame
100  scene->getTransforms().transformPose(pose_msg.header.frame_id, target_pose, target_pose);
101 
102  const geometry_msgs::PoseStamped& ik_frame_msg = props.get<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>("ik_frame");
103  Eigen::Isometry3d ik_frame;
104  tf::poseMsgToEigen(ik_frame_msg.pose, ik_frame);
105  ik_frame = robot_state.getGlobalLinkTransform(ik_frame_msg.header.frame_id) * ik_frame;
106  Eigen::Isometry3d object_to_ik = orig_object_pose.inverse() * ik_frame;
107 
108  // spawn the nominal target object pose, considering flip about z and rotations about z-axis
109  auto spawner = [&s, &scene, &object_to_ik, this](const Eigen::Isometry3d& nominal, uint z_flips,
110  uint z_rotations = 10) {
111  for (uint flip = 0; flip < z_flips; ++flip) {
112  // flip about object's x-axis
113  Eigen::Isometry3d object = nominal * Eigen::AngleAxisd(flip * M_PI, Eigen::Vector3d::UnitX());
114  for (uint i = 0; i < z_rotations; ++i) {
115  // rotate object at target pose about world's z-axis
116  Eigen::Vector3d pos = object.translation();
117  object.pretranslate(-pos)
118  .prerotate(Eigen::AngleAxisd(i * 2. * M_PI / z_rotations, Eigen::Vector3d::UnitZ()))
119  .pretranslate(pos);
120 
121  // target ik_frame's pose w.r.t. planning frame
122  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped target_pose_msg;
123  target_pose_msg.header.frame_id = scene->getPlanningFrame();
124  tf::poseEigenToMsg(object * object_to_ik, target_pose_msg.pose);
125 
126  InterfaceState state(scene);
127  forwardProperties(*s.end(), state); // forward properties from inner solutions
128  state.properties().set("target_pose", target_pose_msg);
129 
130  SubTrajectory trajectory;
131  trajectory.setCost(0.0);
132  rviz_marker_tools::appendFrame(trajectory.markers(), target_pose_msg, 0.1, "place frame");
133 
134  spawn(std::move(state), std::move(trajectory));
135  }
136  }
137  };
138 
139  if (object->getShapes().size() == 1) {
140  switch (object->getShapes()[0]->type) {
141  case shapes::CYLINDER:
142  spawner(target_pose, 2);
143  return;
144 
145  case shapes::BOX: { // consider 180/90 degree rotations about z axis
146  const double* dims = static_cast<const shapes::Box&>(*object->getShapes()[0]).size;
147  spawner(target_pose, 2, (std::abs(dims[0] - dims[1]) < 1e-5) ? 4 : 2);
148  return;
149  }
150  case shapes::SPHERE: // keep original orientation and rotate about world's z
151  target_pose.linear() = orig_object_pose.linear();
152  spawner(target_pose, 1);
153  return;
154  default:
155  break;
156  }
157  }
158 
159  // any other case: only try given target pose
160  spawner(target_pose, 1, 1);
161 }
162 } // namespace stages
163 } // namespace task_constructor
164 } // namespace moveit
